data.title: Default Toxic Screen For Defense
data.description: Place this wall during preparation phase, it acts as a smoke for both the choke points on B Main and Tree.

data.title: B Site Hallway One Way Smoke
data.description: This one way smoke lets you see the feet of anyone pushing through the T side door to B site if you stand on the stairs.

data.title: A Site One Way Poison Cloud to Tree Room
data.description: This one way smoke lets you see the feet of anyone pushing through the door to A site from tree.
